data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Lianyungang, Jiangsu, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lianyungang, Jiangsu, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Lianyungang, Jiangsu, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Lianyungang to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Lianyungang, Jiangsu, China.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ahu
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ahu, Jiangsu, China.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 518,550, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Lianyungang, Jiangsu, China will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lianyungang, Jiangsu, China has a population of 571,100.

We estimate Lianyungang has 43,324 people who might know Jesus, 9,226 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 518,550 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 43,324 believers in Lianyungang against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
